overwatch.security

Class BackgroundMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • overwatch.security.BackgroundMonitor

  • public class BackgroundMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs in the background in a separate thread. Give it things to check with addBackgroundCheck.
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    Lee Coakley
    See Also:
    BackgroundCheck

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BackgroundMonitor()
      Create and begin monitoring immediately in a separate thread.
      BackgroundMonitor(int interval)
      As before, but you specify the interval between checking in milliseconds.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBackgroundCheck(BackgroundCheck bc)
      Add a check to be executed in the background.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void stop()
      Stop monitoring.
      static void stopAll()
      Stops all background monitors that exist.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BackgroundMonitor

        public BackgroundMonitor()
        Create and begin monitoring immediately in a separate thread. There are no default BackgroundCheck objects, you must add some. Checks are performed in-order every 1000ms.

      • BackgroundMonitor

        public BackgroundMonitor(int interval)
        As before, but you specify the interval between checking in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        interval - milliseconds to wait before repeating all checks

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop monitoring. Terminates the thread. WARNING: Do not call this from within a BackgroundChecker!

      • stopAll

        public static void stopAll()
        Stops all background monitors that exist.

      • addBackgroundCheck

        public void addBackgroundCheck(BackgroundCheck bc)
        Add a check to be executed in the background. Checks are performed sequentially, in the order they're added, once per second.
        Parameters:
        bc -

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
